room_title: Escape room "Deadly Seven" by 417 Escape Artist in Springfield (MO)
review: We did the new 7 Deadly Sins room and it rocked! We did not escape but had such a great time that we didn't care! Want to thank Jennifer for being the perfect Gamemaster!

room_title: Escape room "Deadly Seven" by 417 Escape Artist in Springfield (MO)
review: Awesome experience. We did the Seven Deadly Sins and it took a decent amount of effort, more than I honestly expected, and we didn't even do all that great. Overall lots of thought and effort go into these and I was truly impressed with the experience.

room_title: Escape room "Deadly Seven" by 417 Escape Artist in Springfield (MO)
review: We had an awesome date night doing the 7 deadly sins! Didn’t escape in time, but had a blast! Will be back to try another!

room_title: Escape room "Deadly Seven" by 417 Escape Artist in Springfield (MO)
review: This place was awesome! I did the Seven Deadly Sins room and when they tell you what you miss it’s like “oh duh!” But I can’t wait to go back and do more rooms.
